Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

ppgmmga 1.3 (2023-11)

  • Package maintainer change.
  • Removed package ‘ggthemes’ from being a dependency.
  • Added closed-form formula for computing the Negentropy of GMMs. This can be used in ppgmmga() function call by specifying approx = "none". This is at experimental stage.

ppgmmga 1.2 (2019-07)

CRAN release: 2019-07-08

  • Updated references to JCGS paper.
  • Added examples in ppgmmaga.Rd and vignette of possible usage of spinplot() from ‘msir’ package.
  • Updated vignette.

ppgmmga 1.1 (2019-01)

CRAN release: 2019-06-03

  • Added website via pkgdown.
  • Fix a warning in plot.ppgmmga() when d > 2 and dim is set to two coordinates.
  • Updated vignette.

ppgmmga 1.0.1 (2018-10)

CRAN release: 2018-10-15

  • Fix a C++ issue.

ppgmmga 1.0.0 (2018-10)

  • Initial release on CRAN.
